There limited prospective evidence guide nephrologists term patient progress severe AKI set early AKI . Similarly , evidence guide nephrologists term patient completely recover renal function AKI . Thus need know early course AKI patient progress go require RRT . Additonally investigate long term patient outcome , 2-3 year index AKI admission .
